resources:
UK Elections App
Hello blank fragment Sign in
You will now be asked to flip a coin. This is a security measure used to protect against potential malware on your personal computer.
After selecting the result of the coin flip on the voting website, you will be presented with a QR Code. Click “Continue” to scan this.
If this vote has been cast against your will through means such as blackmail, bribery, intimidation or identity theft, you may recast you vote. Click here to find out more
To do this, please bring valid ID and this Mobile device to your local polling Polling station at any point during the voting period.
You will also be asked to log back in to your account. Please ensure you know your credentials.
You ballot ID is:
//Web Check Fragment Signed in Successfully. To continue, please sign into the website"
//Login Fragment Login Password QQ 12 34 56 C
//Check Terms Fragment In order to complete your vote, please accept the terms displayed on your Personal Computer.
